Dear Science Chanel, I'm a big fan

of your TV show “Secret Space Escapes”. Will you interview the first Bulgarian
cosmonaut Georgi Ivanov, who is currently 79 years old, or will make an episode
of his space mission ,,Soyuz 33” which almost killed him in space in 1979? The
astronaut Georgi Ivanov has spoken many times about the damage to the engines
of the space capsule and the premature termination of the Soviet space mission
"Soyuz 33", which saved his life. The Bulgarian national television
made many films about him and you can see them on youtube .  The space capsule and space suit of Georgi
Ivanov are in the aviation museum in Plovdiv. I will leave a link to the cosmonaut
Georgi Ivanov's Facebook if you decide to contact him. The cosmonaut Georgi
Ivanov is a very kind person and he will be really happy to hear from you.
Also, will there be an episode about the space  mission ,,Soyuz TM-5” of the Bulgarian
cosmonaut Alexander Alexandrov?
